content.text: AdtU Bus Services ("we", "us", "our") respects your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and store personal information.

We collect the minimum necessary information to deliver bus tracking and notification services: Name, Email, Employee/Enrollment ID, Route, and (with permission) location coordinates for drivers and students when using the tracking or waiting-flag features.
To provide live tracking, send notifications, improve services, and respond to feedback. We do not sell personal data.
Feedback entries are retained for 30 days and then automatically deleted. Other operational data are retained as per system policy.
We protect your data using standard security measures. Access to feedback management is restricted to Admins and Moderators.
